name: Shift Roar Demo
description:
As the ace of a military research faction known as "Frontlancers", you must fly and stop the coup d'etat of the corrupt faction "JOKER"!

Fight through 6 enemy infested stages as you take down JOKER and their advanced war weapons! Use the supersonic bomber "Shift Roar" skillfully, and erase the enemy forces! When you become skilled enough, take on the X routes, which are harder than the normal ones, but it possesses more rewards! Break through, so all can "Fear Thy Engine's Roar!"
